root.name: Battle Hunter
root.description: Overview Battle hunter is a anime themed turn-based Strategy RPG game, released on Playstation in 2001.StoryIn the years after a major global war, when the human race is nearing extinction a sparse amount of scientists remaining on Earth set out to create a formula to save them. To succeed they need vital intelligence from the ruins of cities around the world, and appointed the task of securing them to an elite task force known as the Hunters. The story revolves the store owner giving jobs to the player to recover the relics of interest from dungeons.
